thread.title: Peggy Steir
thread.title_full: Shop Orthopedics reviewed by Peggy Steir

author: Peggy Steir
title: Peggy Steir
text: The two wrist supports (left and right hand) that I purchased are very comfortable to wear, fairly easy to put on, and do not get your wrist overly warm while wearing. Very comfortable to drive in or use while pushing a wheeled walker. A must for anyone who has had wrist surgery (carpal tunnel) or for anyone with arthritis.
